text: For @questlove: If you want the real roundup of the best fried chicken in NYC, you gotta ask @seriouseats. http://bit.ly/xgpda

You can do a good job by completing everything on the checklist. But you do a great job by knowing what the checklist forgot.

Really enjoying the new Pearl Jam, Alicia Keys and Janet Jackson tracks. Further proof that obscurity is no prerequisite for quality.

On @jimmyfallon tonight, look for me & @jsmooth995 peeking out behind @vurnt22 while @livingcolour plays. Soo much better than Guitar Hero.

Twitter friends: I absolve you. Your avatar no longer has to be green, or be a Mad Men cartoon. Come back, flattering headshots.

I set the default search on Chrome to Bing, to balance out using Google's search on Microsoft browsers for all those years.

Sure.

@tweetfrombelow1 I'd take the criticism a lot more seriously if you weren't anonymous. If you mean it, say it.
